# farcaster-jolt

Simple Jolt program to verify the signature of a Farcaster message.


&nbsp;

---

&nbsp;

## How to use it

```bash
cargo run --release <hex-public-key> <hex-message> <hex-signature>
```

### Example

```bash
cargo run --release 5a0b69f86fd3446e3ddd743a8f820c54dae6362f9512e3f18edbaf56c247e875  6cd20a4fdba838af4d6b236aec33397bd269085666be39bed37a57a532e614aa7bfc1831cd9bd6fb40c994ac588aaa52f66b043c4aeb21ae241b6b1350166700
```
